Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants employee discretion over coverage for dependents
Summary: Grants employee discretion over coverage for dependents; authorizes each employee to have the option of selecting coverage solely for him or herself and his or her spouse.
LawCode: Amd ยง164, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to granting employee's discretion over coverage for dependents
